text: Ezɨ kɨ kamaghɨn nɨn azai, kɨ amizir igiatam mɨkɨm suam, ‘Ai, kɨ dɨpatam amasa, nɨ ti nan akuragh uan dɨpɨzimɨn mɨner dɨpam asigh a inigh izighirɨ.’ Eghtɨ a suam, ‘Are, nɨ damɨ, eghtɨ kɨ dɨpam uaghan nɨn kamelbar anɨngam.’ Eghtɨ, tuavir kamra, kɨ fogham, amizir kamra nɨ uan ingangarir gumazim Aisak bagha a ginaba. Eghtɨ bizir kaba otivightɨ kɨ fogham, nɨ nan gumazir ekiam Abraham bar an apangkufi.”
